Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Conical vase with a straight mouth and a flat base with a knob. The interior surface is black whereas the exterior bears a red slip. Both surfaces were horizontally burnished. The upper section of the exterior surface bears traces of an There is an attempt (?) at creating a vertical rippled effect.
